You should eat a healthy balanced diet that includes plenty of fruits, vegetables, and whole grains. You should also avoid alcohol and fatty or fried foods that can be hard on your liver.
What kind of exercise can I do?

You should avoid any strenuous activity for the first few days after your biopsy, but light exercise such as walking is usually fine. You should avoid any activity that puts pressure on your liver, such as weightlifting or contact sports.
